transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Haan sir.
Customer: Sir call cut jayega yahan network nahi hota.
Executive: Sab kitne bataiye sir.
Customer: Keh raha hun sir isko kar do sir. Sir dekho commitment hui hai kharab kar denge next next month kar denge aapko jab next month nahi aayega itna aapko trust main dilata hun ki aap na iska basic 28000 ka ek saal aap kijiye aur jab isko hum fully satisfied kar denge fir aap isko do saal ya teen saal mein karaiye sir.
Executive: Himanshu ji Himanshu ji Himanshu ji.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Thoda sa sharam aani chahiye aap logon ko jo aadmi.
Customer: Aa rahi hai bahut aa rahi hai aa rahi hai sir.
Executive: Haan sun lo chhe mahina jo aadmi.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Paise dene ke baad bhi jo hai sala wo karata raha usko 24 ghante bhi nahi aap tum hel sakte kaun karayega tumhara renewal.
Executive: Kya nahi kar sakte.
Customer: 24 ghante nahi bardasht kar sakte ek din nahi bardasht karte ek mahine nahi kar sakte aur aap humse ummid kar rahe ho.
Executive: Kya nahi bardasht kar sakte sir 22 tarikh ko khatam ho gaya to tum na aap logon ne chhe mahina aapko malum hai ki chhe mahine baad hamari services start hui hai iske bavajud bhi aapko lagta hai ki sir ab kal khatam ho jayegi aur saat din ka hum ehsan diye hue hain.
Customer: What is ehsan.
Executive: Sir ehsan nahi hum to nahi ehsan nahi hota hai sir ji Maurya sahab please please aisa nahi hota aapko dikhana padega na sir main na chhe mahine ki baat rakhi hai tabhi main aap se baat kar raha hun na sir ji aap khatam hai ye itni wo bhi bol raha tha ki sir sir wo aapko saat din ka humne ehsan diya hua hai.
Customer: Maine nahi bola maine kab bola ehsan main to bol hi nahi raha na kuch bhi sir.
Executive: To fir ye kaun si baat hoti hai main main December mein kara hun January mein kara hun February mein kara hun aapko karna hai to kariyega.
Customer: Sir disconnect karna hai to disconnect kar dijiye main yahi dekhna cha raha tha iska Maurya sahab kisi cheez ka due date hota hai na malik tabhi to hota hai na ke baad nahi hota commitment ka hamari commitment ka koi due date hota tha ya nahi hota tha wali baat kar rahe ho us cheez ko to dekhte hue maine kahin na kahin aapko sahi karke dunga kya kara hai kya kara hai main aapko non valid one month extra karke dunga main aapko kya keh raha hun mera chhe mahine services jo hai disturb rahi proper nahi rahi humne jab ki paid kiya hua tha aage chhe mahine aap aapko chhe din nahi jhela ja raha hai.
Customer: Aapko bardasht nahi ho raha hai.
Executive: Sir kuch non valid de dunga sir bardasht kyu nahi ho raha hai.
Customer: Main main keh raha hun aapko aapko aapko mere itna jigra hai kya.
Executive: Dekho aap company ke owner ho to main.
Customer: Main chhe mahine sala usko continue rakha.
Executive: To fir aap owner nahi ho to ek minute suno Himanshu ji aap owner nahi ho to owner owner jo owner ho usko bolo baat kare hume main owner wali baat karunga.
Executive: Sir main baitha hun na uske liye sir main baitha hun.
Customer: To fir ye kaun si baat hoti hai owner owner nahi ho fir baat kyu kar rahe ho.
Executive: Nahi aap aap keh rahe ho ki aisa nahi hai waisa nahi hai matlab uski baat main kar raha hun.
Customer: Aisa waisa kyu nahi hai paise le liye aur sala wahi Ankita naukri kar rahi hai aur aankhon mein thodi bhi sharam nahi aa rahi hai aapko ki 24 ghante bhi nahi saat din ka ehsan diya hai ji aapko.
Executive: Abhi disconnect kar do aap nahi karoge to main kar deta hun.
Customer: Aisi baaten mat kiya karo hume aage badhna hai sir.
Executive: Aisi baaten kar rahe hain aisi baaten hume suna rahe ho aap ki aapne karaya nahi paise nahi diya aur free ka use kar rahe ho.
Customer: Hum to aaram se hi baat kar rahe hain aap.
Executive: Nahi to kaun free ka use kar raha hai.
Customer: Kab bola free to ye sabhi use hi nahi kiya.
Customer: Haan to isko aapko aap aap keh rahe ho na ki maine aapka compensation dila diya kahan dilwaya batana aap.
Executive: Sir main keh raha hun nayi deal jab jayegi to 25 mahine ki service rahegi ye maine bola 50 mahine ki service aur dilaunga.
Customer: Jab jayegi tab na aapke account mein paise dene ke baad tum sab karoge.
Executive: Nahi performa bhejunga usme likha rahega sir aapka.
Customer: Kuch nahi likha rahega.
Executive: Sir likha check kar lijiye na sir likha rahega theek hai aap aap isko chhe mahine chalao isi pe ab main dekhta hun kitni dam hai.
Customer: Chhe mahine chalao chhe mahina mera disturb raha hai.
Executive: Sir to chhe mahine to nahi ek mahina de raha hun aur ek mahine ki valid hai jo wo extra karke de raha hun ye do cheeze de raha hun main extra aapko karke.
Customer: Ek mahina ek mahina tab de rahe ho na.
Executive: Dekho Himanshu ji aap ji aap mujhe aise mat ghumao ek mahina tab de rahe ho jab main payment dunga main jo keh raha hun bina payment diye aap ek mahina bardasht karo.
Customer: Bina bina payment diye to kuch aap to bas khatam karo main samajh gaya aap samajh gaya.
Customer: Ab dekho kuch cheezon ko pata chalo main ek phone kar raha hun koi baat nahi main aur kahin baat kar raha hun.
Executive: Phone kar dete ho discussion karte ho fir phone bhi.
Customer: Sir kab baat karu aap bata do kab acha kab available hoge bata do mujhe itna to bata dijiye.
Executive: Kab baat karu aap se.
Customer: Aap mujhe bata dijiye.
Executive: Aapke baat karo a jao a jao kal subah 11 baje a jao.
Customer: Kahan?
Executive: Kal subah 11 baje mil lo aap.
Customer: Sir main call pe video meeting pe mil lunga aap se morning mein 11 baje.
Executive: Video meeting pe main nahi milta video meeting pe milke maine bahut nuksan kara hua hai itna bada confusion jo ho ki sala discount bhi de kar ke.
Customer: Kehte ho ki adjustment hua ye koi video video meeting par main nahi karunga.
Executive: Sir ye sara calculation Maurya sahab is bar 200% recording ho rahi hai meri call mein nahi rahega sir koi bhi gap nahi rahega ye main promise karta hun aapko affidavit bana ke aapko ek affidavit do ek minute ek minute Himanshu ji recording wali baat aur kisi ko samjhana ek affidavit banao aur mujhe baqayda na usko wo karke aur hume submit kar do ki aapki call aur sari cheeze recording hoti hai ye sari jhoot bol rahe ho aap log.
Customer: Sir main bhej deta hun ye jo discussion ho rahi hai main bhej deta hun aapko.
Customer: Haan to theek hai wo discussion main apni surety leta hun sir main apni surety leta hun jo main aapko jo bhi discussion ho rahi hai.
Executive: Aapki aapki koi surety nahi hai aapki value is company mein zero hai.
Executive: Sir kaisi baaten keh rahe ho main apni baat kar raha hun.
Customer: Aapko aapko agar apni value batani hai to aap wo recording nikalo jo do saal pehle Ankita ne kara tha.
Executive: Sir meri hoti hai meri hoti hai sabki nahi hoti meri hoti hai wo main apni baat kar raha hun main bhej hi dunga aapko.
Customer: Nahi hoti na aapki bhi aapki bhi nahi hoti.
Executive: Main bhej raha hun chalo koi nahi abhi call rakh raha hun aapko bhej raha hun sir check kar lijiyega.
Customer: Theek hai aap phone ko cut kato koi baat nahi.
Executive: Haan ab main bhej raha hun aapko.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer wants resolution for service issues.

- Customer expresses dissatisfaction with service quality.

- Customer questions the value of their subscription.



Resolution:

- Executive offered one month validity extension.

- Executive promised to send an affidavit.

- Executive invited customer to meet in person.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will send the call recording.



Alert (If Any):

refund

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- refund, subscription, service issues, commitment, recording
